name: Pythonpaterns
body:
# PythonPatterns
This repo contains some design patterns coded in Python. I hope it can help you learn python, as I am learning, and get knowledge of some GoF(Gang of Four) Patterns. If you need some help to understand, or have any suggestion, mail me =D

##Creational Patterns

* [Abstract Factory] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/abstractFactory)
* [Builder] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/builder)
* [Factory Method] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/factoryMethod)
* [Prototype] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/prototype)

##Structural Patterns

* [Adapter] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/adapter)
* [Bridge] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/bridge)
* [Facade] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/facade)

##Behavioral Patterns

* [Memento] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/memento)
* [Observer] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/observer)
* [Strategy] (https://github.com/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns/tree/master/strategy)

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/BrunoDM2943/PythonPatterns)
